title: I Just Don’t Want To Die - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Mature   Romance   Shounen Ai
tags: Artificial Intelligence   Game Elements   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Power Couple   Seme Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   Virtual Reality
author: Tian Tang Fang Zhu Zhe   天堂放逐者
description:
As a BOSS, you just obediently stay in your own lair (dungeon), before being turned into a scapegoat. Most of the time you are beaten down over and over, watching your own items get snatched by others again and again. It’s really miserable.

Regardless of his ultimate fate, a certain BOSS gritted his teeth and said, 'I just don’t want to die, what do I do?'

Xie Ziyi: Hmph, fighting with players is fun.

[System Announcement] The Ultimate Dungeon of Jiuzhou, [Juechen Palace], has been opened. Become the first player to beat the Ultimate Dungeon and you will receive both 10,000 taels of gold and the title: 'Number One in the World.”>
